channel.title: Using 2 accounts at the same time
channel.description:
I am planning to use 2 accounts at the same time, to get lots and lots of Flax, or mine lots and lots of pure essence. My goal is simple: to try and earn at least 1 million GP per day. I need to make my millions back. I have a LOT of stuff I want to purchase, including 4 of the Barrows sets.
Any tips on using 2 accounts at the same time to accomplish normally boring tasks??

item.title: Using 2 accounts at the same time
item.dc:creator: @chazizkool chazizkool
item.description:
@chazizkool wrote:

Legiting is more fun because I find it just fun to pk and fish.

Read full topic

item.source: Using 2 accounts at the same time

item.title: Using 2 accounts at the same time
item.dc:creator: @anthony8150 anthony8150
item.description:
@anthony8150 wrote:

ok just have character A on one world and character B on a different world, and you can have them logged in at the same time. If you are going to do flax and pure ess then have character A mine the ess while you are using character B to pick the flax. Be sure to check character A after every load of flax you pick with Character B (just in case character A gets a random event or logs out)

Read full topic
item.source: Using 2 accounts at the same time

item.title: Using 2 accounts at the same time
item.dc:creator: @Marik Marik
item.description:
@Marik wrote:

RIP RSC: I’d do it with autoing, but there are no reliable flax pickers or ess miners out there. There are, sure, but they don’t work 100%. And I’m not in a position right now to pay RS money for them.

item.title: Using 2 accounts at the same time
item.dc:creator: @solemage2 solemage2
item.description:
@solemage2 wrote:

working with 2 accounts at the same time can get confusing, But pretty much just keep mining ess but keep each in diffrent places, i mean, have one at bank and the other mining. when he is full start walking the other so you can leave one guy alone mining while your on the other puting in the bank and so forth, thats what I do and i get a good load of ess.

Read full topic
item.source: Using 2 accounts at the same time
